improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero. The variable 'x' will be 0 after the loop. Add a check to ensure x is not zero before performing the division.

Unreachable code. The loop will always run completely and end up making x=0. The code after the loop is unreachable because of this. This should be investigated to ensure that this is expected behavior.

The for loop will always execute 10 times and decrement 'x' in each iteration.  This behavior might lead to unexpected results. You should check this part of the code to ensure the intended logic is correct.
